name: Delete connector fails for unprivileged user

error.reason: action [cluster:admin/xpack/connector/sync_job/delete] is unauthorized for user [entsearch-user] with effective roles [user], this action is granted by the cluster privileges [manage_connector,manage,all]

root_cause.reason: action [cluster:admin/xpack/connector/sync_job/delete] is unauthorized for user [entsearch-user] with effective roles [user], this action is granted by the cluster privileges [manage_connector,manage,all]
